amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in the Congressional Record to add a paragraph within Section 2 that paragraph (1) shall not take effect until the Secretary submits to Congress a report on the necessity of acting under the authority of this section to refill the Reserve.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a paragraph within Section 2 that paragraph (1) shall not take effect until the Secretary submits to Congress a report on the necessity of acting under the authority of Section 2 to refill the Reserve.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 220 (Roll no. 71).

action.text: Amendment (A045) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
